item.title: Self-hosting MinIO S3 for Urbit
item.description: Background This tutorial will walk you through the process of configuring MinIO on your server, which will allow you to host images and content for your ship, but without relying on or paying for a third party host. S3 is a service offered by Amazon’s web service division that allows you to cheaply host data that you can programatically access with other applications. S3 is wildly popular, and as a result has an API that is widely supported by a lot of software.
